name: Typical Werewolf Love Story
description:
WARNING: This game contains a small amount of bad language.

In Typical Werewolf Love Story, you're a girl who moves into a new apartment building in a city called Cagin. Within the first night you learn that your neighbors are more supernatural than they seem.  You go through three "dates" with a neighbor of your choice.

The love interests:

Kent Thomas

Seth Jones

Jinx Dire

This was originally our submission  for the Otome 2019 game jam but we were unable to get it done in time.  Because we were planning for a short amount of time to finish there are some problems with it (aka spelling errors, visual issues and such. This is the leader's first ever game, so-) Regardless we hope you enjoy playing this game!

BTW: If at the end of the game this screen shows up just click ignore and go to the main menu through the preferences screen if you're done playing.
